## AtomEvent class

单原子事件管理器

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class AtomEvent<T> 
```

## Example


```ts
const e = AtomEvent<number>();
const listener: AtomEventListener<number> = (n) => { console.info(n) };
e.on(listener);
e.emit(1024);
e.off(listener);
```
